TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug used to treat many types of bacterial infections. It stops the growth of bacteria by keeping them from making proteins. It is a type of antibiotic.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "hiclato de doxiciclina"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que se usa para tratar muchos tipos de infecciones bacterianas. Impide el crecimiento de las bacterias porque les impide elaborar proteínas. Es un tipo de antibiótico.
